properties.name: management.zipkin.tracing.endpoint
properties.description: Zipkin server endpoint for sending traces

properties.name: stripe.secret-key
properties.description: Stripe API secret key (server-side). Provide via environment variable STRIPE_SECRET_KEY.

properties.name: stripe.publishable-key
properties.description: Stripe publishable key (client-side). Provide via environment variable STRIPE_PUBLISHABLE_KEY.

properties.name: stripe.api-version
properties.description: Stripe API version used by the server

properties.name: app.cors.allowed-origins
properties.description: Comma-separated list of allowed CORS origins

properties.name: app.rate-limit.requests-per-minute
properties.description: Requests per minute limit for rate limiting

properties.name: app.startup.validate-credentials
properties.description: When true, perform strict startup credential validation. Disable in tests if needed.

properties.name: keycloak.auth-server-url
properties.description: Keycloak authentication server base URL (e.g., http://localhost:8080)

properties.name: keycloak.client-id
properties.description: OAuth2 client identifier for the application

properties.name: keycloak.client-secret
properties.description: OAuth2 client secret (store in secrets manager, not version control)

properties.name: keycloak.admin.username
properties.description: Keycloak admin username for programmatic user management

properties.name: keycloak.admin.password
properties.description: Keycloak admin password (store in secrets manager)

properties.name: keycloak.admin.enabled
properties.description: Enable Keycloak admin client for user management operations
